tool_description:
Provide most accurate data of Indonesian cities weather and forecast plus latest earthquake alert.

Prakiraan cuaca, suhu udara, kelembapan udara, kecepatan angin, dan arah angin untuk kota-kota besar di 34 provinsi di Indonesia dalam waktu 3 harian dan gempa terbaru dengan format JSON yang lebih ramah.
name: Indonesia Most Accurate Weather and Earthquake
title: Indonesia Most Accurate Weather and Earthquake
tool_name: Indonesia Most Accurate Weather and Earthquake

api_list.name: Weather forecast for Indonesian cities BMKG
api_list.description: Weather forecast for Indonesian cities BMKG
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-most-accurate-weather-and-earthquake.p.rapidapi.com/weather/jawa-timur/surabaya"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-most-accurate-weather-and-earthquake.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-most-accurate-weather-and-earthquake.p.rapidapi.com/weather/{province}/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-most-accurate-weather-and-earthquake.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
